Interface TypeSerializer<T>

public interface TypeSerializer<T>
An interface for serializing type objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    deserialize(com.google.gson.Gson gson, com.google.gson.JsonElement element)
    Deserialize a GSON json element to object.
    com.google.gson.JsonElement
    serialize(com.google.gson.Gson gson, T value)
    Serialize a value to a GSON json element.

  • Method Details

    • serialize

      com.google.gson.JsonElement serialize(com.google.gson.Gson gson, T value)
      Serialize a value to a GSON json element. The Gson object is preserved from the VariableStorage.
      Parameters:
      gson - Gson context.
      value - the value to serialize
      Returns:
      the classes of the objects that the implementing object can be changed to

    • deserialize

      T deserialize(com.google.gson.Gson gson, com.google.gson.JsonElement element)
      Deserialize a GSON json element to object. The Gson object is preserved from the VariableStorage.
      Parameters:
      gson - Gson context.
      element - the GSON json element.
